names.english: stephania, zanthoxylum, tingli and rhubarb pill
names.commonEnglish: Stephania, Zanthoxylum, Tingli and Rhubarb Pill Stephania, Zanthoxylum, Descurainia and Rhubarb Pill

actions: Promotes urination and reduces edema especially in the lower body.
With Da Huang, Jiao Mu and Ting Li Zi, for dysuria and constipation due to water accumulation.
Promotes diuresis, regulates urination, resolves swelling, eliminates Phlegm and relieves dyspnea.
Drains the Lungs, reduces Phlegm, calms wheezing, circulates water and reduces edema.
With Han Fang Ji, Jiao Mu and Da Huang, for facial edema and fluid accumulation in the chest and abdomen.
Drains Heat, purges accumulations, transforms Dampness, promotes urination, activates the Blood and dispels Blood Stasis.
With Han Fang Ji and Ting Li Zi, for water Accumulation with edema and abdominal fullness.

syndromes: Accumulation of Water in the Stomach and Intestines with Qi Stagnation

manifestations.pulse: Wiry and slippery or Deep, full and slightly rapid

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with Spleen Deficiency
